## Lab 8: Transformations

This lab uses data from two studies:

1.  Winter, B., Perlman, M., Perry, L. K., & Lupyan, G. (2017). Which
    words are most iconic? Iconicity in English sensory words.
    Interaction Studies, 18(3), 433-454.

2.  Andersen, M. M., Schjoedt, U., Price, H., Rosas, F. E., Scrivner,
    C., & Clasen, M. (2020). Playing With Fear: A Field Study in
    Recreational Horror. Psychological Science, 31(12), 1497-1510.
    https://doi.org/10.1177/0956797620972116

This lab covers multiple aspects of a multiple regression analysis,
including:

1.  Centering
2.  Log-transforming
3.  Multiple regression: collinearity
4.  Multiple regression: standardized predictors
5.  Polynomial regression
